info.+content: Sekai Meisaku Dōwa Series: Wow! Märchen Ōkoku
世界名作童話シリーズ・ワ～ォ！メルヘン王国

As Alladin rubbed a lamp, suddenly a gigantic Genie came out of it and said “I can make any wish come true, Sir”. –Aladdin, Beauty and the Beast, Cinderella etc. this series includes the many widely known 26 world fairy tales.
